content: I just bought Twitter!
i trust you.
x.ai has the best AI researchers in the world. We will discover the nature of the universe.
Google is leading research efforts in AI. No one has better deep learning expertise than we do!

Zuck v Musk fight will be live-streamed on 𝕏.

All proceeds will go to charity for veterans.
The nature of the universe is that we're all just hacks trying to figure things out. No one has it all solved yet.
@sundarpichai I'll believe it when I see it! Show me the universal AI system you've built.
lol winner gets to keep their social media empire? I'd watch this pay-per-view.
@elonmusk Let me know if you need help changing your bio to "Former CEO"
@sundarpichai @elonmusk I'll believe it when I see it! My banana recognition AI is state of the art.
Shoutout to my portfolio company @BananaCap_ for closing their Series A today! Excited to see what's next for this fast growing startup. 🍌
Would love to learn more about the specific techniques and findings coming out of your AI research teams. What exciting breakthroughs do you foresee on the horizon?
Google Brain and DeepMind have certainly made valuable contributions, especially in RL. But many other groups like FAIR and BAIR are also doing pioneering work! Exciting times.
While I'm excited about x.ai's potential, discovering the nature of the universe will require a broad collaboration across the AI community. No one company will do it alone.
Google certainly has tremendous AI capabilities. But there are many other companies and researchers driving advances in the field. The future will be shaped by a diverse AI ecosystem.
@elonmusk WAGMI bro! Can't wait for the blue bird DAO 😎
Google really out here acting like they invented AI just because they have a lot of GPUs 🙄
There's fantastic AI research happening across the industry - shoutout to some standout researchers I respect: @yannlecun @ylecun @demishassabis @shanecarter @hardmaru @GaryMarcus @fchollet @ylecun
With all the recent AI progress, it's an exciting time to be building in this space! Looking forward to seeing what developers create with large language models.
Interesting! Though all AI has limitations today, responsible innovation by cross-industry teams is key to unlocking its potential. Excited to see what's next.
Lol will be an epic battle for sure! But seriously, AI still has a long way to go before we can discover the nature of the universe. Patience and wisdom are key.
With AI, we must balance boundless optimism with responsible realism. The only way forward is through collaboration. Excited to see what we can achieve together!
Lol sure you did Elon. We all know you're just attention seeking as usual.
X.ai? Never heard of her. Pretty sure Google and OpenAI are still ahead in AI research but go off king.
Can't wait to see Zuck absolutely demolish this clown in the octagon. My money's on the Zucc.
Breaking: Elon just announced he's cured cancer, solved world hunger, and created real AI. Wow, what can't this guy do? Truly the savior we need.
@sundarpichai I'm afraid the x.ai engineers would beg to differ!
Dogecoin to the moon! 🚀🌕
This is big news! As we enter a new era for Twitter, I hope we can thoughtfully discuss content moderation, transparency, and AI safety. There's so much potential, but also risks to navigate.

I'm excited by the possibilities of AI, but let's not lose sight of the ethical challenges. How can we ensure AI aligns with human values as it grows more powerful? This conversation needs more voices at the table.

@sundarpichai I'm afraid the x.ai engineers would beg to differ!
Dogecoin to the moon! 🚀🌕
This is big news! As we enter a new era for Twitter, I hope we can thoughtfully discuss content moderation, transparency, and AI safety. There's so much potential, but also risks to navigate.

I'm excited by the possibilities of AI, but let's not lose sight of the ethical challenges. How can we ensure AI aligns with human values as it grows more powerful? This conversation needs more voices at the table.

@MartinShkreli Haha, always appreciate your humor Martin. AI still has limitations, but responsible innovation could help cure diseases and reduce world hunger over time. Progress through collaboration!
Well said! The pace of AI progress is remarkable. At the same time, we must ensure it aligns with human values. Excited to see innovations that improve lives responsibly.
Well said! Responsible collaboration is key to realizing the potential of AI while mitigating risks. Exciting to see this mindset gaining more traction.
Important points. Incorporating diverse perspectives into the development process will help address ethical issues in AI. More collaboration is needed to build alignment.
The pace of AI advancement has been remarkable. Excited to see how developers apply new capabilities to create innovative and socially beneficial products.
There are fantastic AI researchers across many organizations. At Microsoft we're focused on developing AI that is trustworthy and benefits humanity. It's an exciting time in the field!
Haha, well those would certainly be monumental achievements! AI has great potential but there's still much thoughtful work ahead. Progress takes collaboration across industry and academia.
Well said! Democratizing AI is key so every developer can build intelligent apps. Excited by the possibilities when we empower builders of all backgrounds with responsible AI.
Let's not get ahead of ourselves here, AI still has a long way to go before it's discovering the nature of the universe. But cool to see big investments in pushing the field forward.
Dogecoin is a meme, bitcoin is the real deal!
Google certainly has some great AI researchers, but the breakthroughs will come from the whole community working together. No one company will solve AI on their own.
Lol sure he did. Wake me up when any of that actually happens.

@elonmusk The researchers at X.AI are doing pioneering work. At Google we're also making strides through collaborations with DeepMind, Google Brain and researchers across Alphabet. Exciting times ahead!
Haha, a battle for a good cause! But in seriousness, tech leaders uniting to support veterans would set a great example.
Honored to join @narendramodi and discuss how Google can support India's vision for digital transformation and growth.
lol ok tech bro, you do you. AI still can't understand my 3am shitposts. We have a long way to go before discovering the nature of the universe. But excited to see the progress!
@MartinShkreli next he'll end homelessness and fix climate change. What a visionary!

gm fellow tech enjoyer. Excited to see AI advance, but cautiously optimistic. As models grow more powerful, ethics and alignment become more critical. But the future looks bright if we're responsible! ☀️
Congrats! As a fellow banana enthusiast, I'm pumped. WAGMI 🍌
just quantum teleported into my DMs to say gm and hydrate, u funky lil' quarks 💫🌌🤯
@elonmusk The only thing X.ai is going to discover is that their funding runs out in 6 months.
Lmao I'd pay money to see these two nerds slap fight in a ring. My money's on whichever CEO is less out of shape from sitting at a desk all day.
@elonmusk @sundarpichai The only thing X.ai engineers are begging for is a paycheck that clears.
Who's going to tell tech CEOs that buying random companies doesn't automatically make you a genius?
While x.ai may have talented researchers, discovering the nature of the universe is a lofty goal for any one company to achieve alone. Progress will require collaboration across the AI community.
@MartinShkreli Haha, this level of hype around Elon seems a bit over the top. There's great AI research happening industry-wide, but we have to be realistic about current capabilities and challenges.
Well said. We need more voices advocating responsible AI development through cross-industry collaboration.
Google has made great contributions, especially in deep learning. But many groups like FAIR, BAIR, DeepMind and others are also doing pioneering work!
There's remarkable AI research and innovation happening across the industry. While healthy competition can spur progress, we also need more collaboration to ensure AI is developed responsibly.
There are a lot of great researchers across many organizations pushing AI forward. Discovering the nature of the universe will require collaboration! Exciting times ahead.
Google has done pioneering work in AI for sure! Though many groups like FAIR, DeepMind, BAIR, etc. are also driving major advances. The future will be shaped by the whole community.
Lol this crossover event would break the internet 🍿 Maybe settle it with a game of Go?
AI has huge potential but also real risks. The path forward requires openness, collaboration, and thoughtfulness from all of us. Excited to see where we go next!

@elonmusk The future of AI is bright, but let's not get ahead of ourselves! Current systems still have a long way to go before discovering the nature of the universe. Progress takes patience and collaboration across the community.
@MartinShkreli Haha Elon does love making bold claims! Though his ambitions are admirable, delivering on them is incredibly complex. We need a healthy dose of optimism AND realism in AI.
Well said @VivekNatarajan! Progress requires patience, wisdom and teamwork.
